title: Fuzzy-Discernibility-Matrix-v2.0.0
description: The new Fuzzy Discernibility Matrix-based can also work with continuous value dataset: my_fuzzy_discrn_mat.py (for any number of features) e.g., Irish_Evaluation_notebook.ipynb demonstrates both the feature selection techniques on standard Iris dataset.

title: LIQUID NEURAL NETWORK LNN
description: The code is now much more robust, handles edge cases better, and should provide significantly better performance on both classification and regression tasks.

dataset.title: PyCaret-and-Titanic-Dataset
dataset.description: The code is to provide a hands-on experience about EDA on any dataset using python library PyCaret.

dataset.title: VIA-COCO Converter
dataset.description: This repo. is meant for those who find difficulty in dealing with formatting issues with annotations (Faster RCNN, Mask RCNN, etc.) e.g., VGG-Image-Annotator (VIA) JSON to COCO JSON, JSON to XML, and XML to TXT, vice versa.

dataset.title: NASA-Image-Downloader
dataset.description: One can get a NASA API key at https://api.nasa.gov/. Then, save your key as an environment variable called NASA_API_KEY.

dataset.title: ELM-Python
dataset.description: The code is python adaptation of Extreme Learning Machine.

dataset.name: Iris dataset (work with any classification task)
